{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft
from lib.controllers import todoController as con

def main(page: ft.Page):
    appbar = ft.AppBar(
        center_title=True,
        title=ft.Text(value="TODOアプリ"),
        bgcolor=ft.colors.BLACK12
    )

    def route_change(e):
        template_route = ft.TemplateRoute(page.route)

        if template_route.match("/create"):
            createTextField = ft.TextField(hint_text="TODO")
            appbar.leading = ft.IconButton(icon=ft.icons.ARROW_BACK, on_click=lambda _:page.go("/"))
            page.views.append(
                ft.View(
                    "/create",
                    appbar=appbar,
                    controls=[
                        ft.Text("TODO作成"),
                        createTextField,
                        ft.ElevatedButton(text="作成",on_click=lambda e:con.create_todo(e, createTextField.value, page))
                    ]
                )
            )
        elif template_route.match("/"):
            appbar.leading = ft.Text("")
            floating_button = ft.FloatingActionButton(
                icon=ft.icons.ADD,
                bgcolor=ft.colors.BLUE_200,
                on_click=lambda _: page.go("/create")
            )
            con.fetch_todo(page)
            page.views.append(
                ft.View(
                    "/",
                    appbar=appbar,
                    controls=[con.todo_list_control],
                    floating_action_button=floating_button
                )
            )
        page.update()

    page.on_route_change = route_change
    page.go(page.route)

ft.app(main)"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft
from lib.models import todoGateway as gate
from lib.models.todoModel import Todo

todo_list_control = ft.Column()

def create_todo(e, task, page):
    gate.save_todo(task)
    page.go("/")

def fetch_todo(page):
    rows = gate.get_todo()
    todo_list = []
    for row in rows:
        todo = Todo(id=row[0],task=row[1],isAchieved=row[2] == 1,created_at=row[3])
        todo_list.append(todo)
    controls = []
    for todo in todo_list:
        text = ft.Text(todo.task)
        checkbox = ft.Checkbox(on_change=lambda e, isAchieved=todo.isAchieved, id=todo.id:check_todo(e, isAchieved, id, page))
        if todo.isAchieved:
            text.style = ft.TextStyle(decoration=ft.TextDecoration.LINE_THROUGH)
            checkbox.value = todo.isAchieved
        controls.append(
            ft.Row([
                checkbox,
                text,
                ft.IconButton(icon=ft.icons.DELETE,on_click=lambda e,id=todo.id: delete_todo(e, id, page))
            ]))
    todo_list_control.controls = controls
    page.update()

def delete_todo(e, id, page):
    gate.delete_todo(id)
    fetch_todo(page)

def check_todo(e, isAchieved, id, page):
    if isAchieved:
        isAchieved = 0
    else:
        isAchieved = 1
    gate.check_todo(isAchieved, id)
    fetch_todo(page)"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import sqlite3

dbname = 'sqlite3.db'

def get_todo():
    conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute('SELECT * FROM todo')
    rows = cur.fetchall()
    conn.commit()
    cur.close()
    conn.close()
    return rows

def save_todo(task):
    conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute('INSERT INTO todo(task) VALUES (?)',(task,))
    conn.commit()
    cur.close()
    conn.close()

def delete_todo(id):
    conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute('DELETE FROM todo WHERE id = ?',(id,))
    conn.commit()
    cur.close()
    conn.close()

def check_todo(isAchieved, id):
    conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)
    cur = conn.cursor()
    cur.execute('UPDATE todo SET isAchieved = ? WHERE id = ?',(isAchieved, id))
    conn.commit()
    cur.close()
    conn.close()"],"caption":[]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import sqlite3

dbname = 'sqlite3.db'
conn = sqlite3.connect(dbname)

cur = conn.cursor()

cur.execute(
    'CREATE TABLE todo(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, task STRING, isAchieved BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)')

conn.commit()

cur.close()
conn.close()"],"caption":[]}
